nodes.text: Roxuli was a Republic member world in the Roxuli system, near the frontier with the Unknown Regions.

Roxuli was the last planet where the Outbound Flight stopped before entering the Unknown Regions. It was here that Palpatine tricked Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker into abandoning Outbound Flight, convincing Obi-Wan to attempt to settle a dispute between the people of Roxuli and the local asteroid mining colonists.
Roxuli and its asteroid field provided ore to half the sector.
The novel Outbound Flight incorrectly places Roxuli in the Albanin sector which is on the other side of the galaxy.
